Missouri S&T State Tournament – March 7

February 10, 2015February 10, 2015 Tim Van Hoose

March 6th – We will have a practice party in the high school to give visiting teams to Rolla a chance to use our practice field and our tools to work on their robots. Also, this will give teams an opportunity to scout the competition at the tournament.

March 7th – The tournament at MS&T. HereÂ are the directions to Gale Bullman, where the tournament will be. Good Luck, and have fun!

Tim Van Hoose
